segments.text: Everything in this kitchen looks so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's methodically drying dishes by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I spot the faucet running unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling over, creating a hazardous puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in it, apron and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are at the cabinet, boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That thing's full of treatsâ€”they must be thrilled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting her turn, arm extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's unstable; it might give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With the wet floor, slipping is a real risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems like a safe haven.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of amusement and concern watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids will be kids, after all.
segments.speaker: PAR
